title: What is the importance of contemporary arts in the Philippines? - Quora

response.answer_text: That depends on Philippino artists, and Philippino’s. A contemporary artist responds to the times and his or her aesthetic sensibilities which are often drawn from their own culture. Along with that, artists can also introduce new ideas and innovations. Or, an artist can create propaganda and reinforce national identity. But the most celebrated artists will be those who follow their own authentic truths in service of their own heart and mind. What about money? That is a different matter. When your way of living aligns with a sustainable income, that’s ideal. But everyone has a time when they don’t align. When that happens you have to do the best you can. But creation is something you can’t help but do. To discover the importance of your contemporary art in the Philipines, look for patrons, and invite them to contribute to your living. Learn about what is important. Extend your experience. In general, the importance of contemporary arts in the Philippines could also be found in its acceptance by patrons in the world at large. Is it collected? Is it exhibited in museums? Can you find it in the major auction houses? Do ex-patriate Philippino’s collect the art created by Philippino’s?
